authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Custom Fields
options.action: Get custom fields from a list

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: assignee
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: priority
options.description: Integer mapping as 1 : Urgent, 2 : High, 3 : Normal, 4 : Low

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: priority
options.description: Integer mapping as 1 : Urgent, 2 : High, 3 : Normal, 4 : Low

options.name: status
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

commentsOn.name: commentsOn
commentsOn.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

team.name: team
team.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
team.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

filters.name: filters
filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

type.name: type
type.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

newName.name: newName
newName.description: New name to set for the tag
newName.ai_hint: New name to set for the tag

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

includeSubtasks.name: includeSubtasks
includeSubtasks.description: Whether to also fetch and include subtasks for this task

includeMarkdownDescription.name: includeMarkdownDescription
includeMarkdownDescription.description: Whether to include the markdown_description field in the response. This is important for preserving links in the description.

field.name: field
field.description: The ID of the field to add custom field to
field.ai_hint: The ID of the field to add custom field to

jsonParse.name: jsonParse
jsonParse.description: The value is JSON and will be parsed as such. Is needed if for example needed for labels which expects the value to be an array.

value.name: value
value.description: The value to set on custom field
value.ai_hint: The value to set on custom field

running.name: running
running.description: Whether to return just the current running time entry

tagsUi.name: tagsUi
tagsUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

tagNames.name: tagNames
tagNames.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
tagNames.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'checklist' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'checklist' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'task'

IF resource == 'checklistItem' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'checklistItem'

IF resource == 'taskTag' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'taskTag' AND operation IN ["remove", "add"] THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF resource == 'taskTag' AND operation IN ["remove", "add"] THEN SHOW parameter 'tagName'
IF resource == 'taskTag' AND operation IN ["remove", "add"] THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
